## At a Glance

This is meant to be the lowest effort but kinda delicious meal you can get while out on the trail. 

## Ingredients

Chicken ramen packet,
Tsp peanut butter (added when water is added),
Dried scallions,
Dried carrots,
Peanuts crushed,
Canned chicken (added when water is added),
Cayenne pepper

## Instructions

Mix it all together in your camping mug
